resources.string: XClipper can show you suggestions based on the last word from a search query.\nLong press item to show more options.
"Could not show suggestions due to low memory"
Whenever you type using the keyboard a small bubble will pop from where you can paste your existing clips into the field.
Tap on the screen (left) to set the initial position of bubble.\n\nThe bubble will always constraint to the either edge of the screen.
Requesting access to grant pin lock
